text: Akihiro Koike (; born 1 November 1962) is a Japanese rowing coxswain. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Japan Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Coxswains (rowing)
title: Akihiro Koike
